notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: N.N. carried out plants collection, extraction, and isolation, in vitro and in vivo experimental work, literature search, and wrote the manuscript; M.Z. supervised the work, finalized the manuscript for publication and revised the paper; R.U. carried out the formal analysis; E.E. and G.A.E.M. has done final editing. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
